To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Experience 1 to 3 years Additional Requirements Age 23 to 30 years Responsibilities & Context Operational Leadership: Supervise team members, monitor day-to-day operations, and take quick decisions to manage crises. Administration & Management: Oversee documentation, filing, asset management, and ensure compliance with internal policies and government/donor regulations. Human Resources: Assist in recruitment, onboarding, performance appraisals, training, and managing employee attendance or leave records. Procurement & Inventory: Manage vendor relationships, negotiate contracts, issue purchase orders (PO), and manage store inventory (e.g., ensuring FIFO stock management). Finance & Reporting: Prepare financial reports, manage budgets, process payments, and prepare for audits. Communication: Act as a liaison for internal and external communication and prepare reports for management. Visa Counselor : Asia Tours & Travels Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Asia Tours & Travels Visa Counselor Application Deadline : 01 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 15 Location: Chattogram, Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 19 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Demonstrated experience managing a significant number of clients efficiently with professionalism, skill, and due diligence. Regularly follow up with prospective leads to ensure proper guidance, build relationships, and achieve successful client conversion. Professionally assist in both online and offline marketing activities to support business growth. Provide appropriate consultation and advice based on clients` goals, needs, and expectations. Maintain accurate client records, update information regularly, and ensure proper follow-up. Assist clients with required documentation, application procedures, and related formalities. Clearly explain service details, processes, and requirements in a professional manner. Coordinate effectively with marketing and operations teams to ensure smooth service delivery. Participate actively in meetings, workshops, training sessions, and professional development activities. Maintain and update client communications through phone calls, Facebook, WhatsApp, email, and other relevant platforms. Responsibilities & Context Short description: We are looking for an energetic and professional Counselor to join our team. The candidate must be confident, able to communicate clearly and enthusiastic about providing the right guidance and support to clients. The key responsibilities of this position are to understand the needs of clients, provide appropriate advice and ensure a pleasant and satisfactory service. Responsibilities : Provide accurate visa counseling for different countries Guide students and clients on visa requirements and documentation Prepare, review, and follow up visa files Analyze visa refusal cases and suggest solutions Maintain professional service standards of the organization Skills & Expertise Call Center Communication Counseling Sales & Marketing Student Counseling Telemarketing Suggested by Student Visa Processing Visa Processing Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Tour allowance,Mobile bill,Profit share Salary Review: Yearly Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Chattogram, Dhaka Company Information Asia Tours & Travels Follow More jobs from this company Address: Jamuna Future Park Level #3, Shop #3A-043 KA-244, Kuril Pragati Sharani Bashundhara R/A, Dhaka-1229, Dhaka, Bangladesh, 1229 Business: We provide all country`s Visa, Air Ticket, student consultancy Etc.
